synopsis.text:
Colt, Fireball, April, and their fearless leader, Saber Rider, make up the elite Star Sheriffs, tasked with maintaining order and justice in the New Frontier, a sprawling expanse of space colonies beyond Earth. As humanity ventures further into the cosmos, establishing settlements on distant planets, the Earth Federation Government struggles to maintain control, leading to growing tension between the central authority and the colonists. Amidst this uneasy peace, a formidable alien race known as the Deathcula, or Outriders, emerges, wreaking havoc on the colonies in search of new living space and energy sources.

To combat this technologically superior foe, the Star Sheriffs are equipped with the transformable starship Bismarck and the combat robot Ramrod. The team's diverse skills and backgrounds, from Saber Rider's aristocratic demeanor and advanced mecha suit to Colt's cowboy charm, April's unwavering support, and Fireball's daring racing abilities, make them a formidable force against the Outriders. As the Star Sheriffs, they stand as the last line of defense between the colonists and total chaos, embarking on thrilling adventures to protect their newfound home in the New Frontier.
